description:
Irrespective of projectname nova-manage command shows a quota list.
Steps to reproduce:

nova-manage project quota projectname

Expected Result:

Error message which indicates Projectname is not valid
Actual Result:
Quota list is displayed
title: Quota is displaying with out existence of project

comments.content:
Irrespective of projectname nova-manage command shows a quota list.
Steps to reproduce:

nova-manage project quota projectname

Expected Result:

Error message which indicates Projectname is not valid
Actual Result:
Quota list is displayed
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~kommuri-siddanth

comments.content: This is outside of the scope of the current implementation.  Projects are not stored in nova so there is no way to validate the existence of a project without talking to keystone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
